headline: Marriott International Celebrates 100 Signings for City Express by Marriott in the U.S. and Canada
summary: Marriott International, Inc. today announced it has reached 100 signed agreements for City Express by Marriott properties in the U.S. and Canada. With six properties that have opened so far in 2025, and four more slated to open by the end of the year, this achievement underscores the demand that is fueling the company's expanding midscale portfolio.

content.title: Marriott International Celebrates 100 Signings for City Express by Marriott in the U.S. and Canada

headline: Is Marriott (MAR) Quietly Repositioning Its Brand With Luxury Experiences And Franchised Expansion?
summary: In recent days, analyst sentiment toward Marriott International has turned more positive, with Goldman Sachs upgrading its rating and several firms revisiting their views as the company expands its global managed and franchised hotel portfolio. At the same time, Marriott is leaning into higher-end and experiential offerings, from wellness-focused luxury concepts to branded residences and fashion collaborations, which could influence how investors assess the depth and resilience of its travel...
